// Titles assigned to admonition blocks:
//.An admonition title
//[NOTE]
//====
//A note.
//====

// Titles assigned to paragraph admonitions:
//.An admonition title
//NOTE: A note.

// Titles assigned to admonition blocks:
////
.An admonition title
[NOTE]
====
A note.
====
////

// Titles assigned to paragraph admonitions:
////
.An admonition title
NOTE: A note.
////
